attributes.action: legislate to protect people against holiday schemes and other such similar scams
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are a number of companies who hold prtesentations to try and sell people holiday schemes or timeshares. Many of them give false or misleading information and offer no cooling-off period. There government should put in place some level of protection to the public against these schemes and to make it an offence to operate such a scheme.
